website_summaries.verdict: A versatile ab belt that acts as a built-in sauna to help you optimize your calorie burn.
pros: Flexible ab belt is designed to fit both men and women with waists up to 44 inches with a maximum elastic limit of 50 inches
Offers an inner hook and loop strip that delivers extra belt strength
Lightweight construction ensures you can wear the belt and move comfortably at all times
cons: Sauna effect leaves much to be desired
Not as sturdy as comparable ab belts

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A simple joke. stick to skin and when remove it is so hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Mala

customer_reviews.title: I did not like the product at all
customer_reviews.text: It is not even worth it because It is just a regular corset girdle, It does not have sauna affect or anything. I did not like the product at all. I really do not recommend anyone...
customer_reviews.author: burcu

customer_reviews.title: This sucks
customer_reviews.text: This product sucks. I don’t recommend it! It’s cheap and awful material..and I went to go return it and never got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mia stewart

customer_reviews.title: A Real Waist Trimmer!
customer_reviews.text: My husbands friend that's a Trainer in MI recommended this for my husband and for his Clients, so I bought 2, one for each of us. It makes us sweat like pigs, but I do see definition in my abs that wasn't there before. I've always worked out (3-5 miles of walking several times per week), but I've never been able to get that type of definition in my ab area. This Waist Trimmer has really helped to get my waist down to 33 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Taggart

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it alot!
customer_reviews.text: I can't attest to the waist reduction just yet, but man I sweat with this thing on! I feel temporarily slimmer after I'm done working out while wearing it. It rolls up a little when I wrap it, but only on the top layer after it has been wrapped around my waist. It does not roll up at all around my hips like some of the others. I agree with the other reviewers, this thing is super comfortable for being a waist trimmer! I sometimes forget to take it off...
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Makes you sweat!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this maybe 2 or 3 years ago and I still use it and love it! I wear it to the gym to sweat more and lose belly fat. I've definitely lost some more weight in the love handles. It's also comfortable to wear around the house so I'll occasionally do that if I can't make it to the gym I can still sweat a bit extra
customer_reviews.author: Katertotz97

customer_reviews.title: I see results with this belt. My posture has ...
customer_reviews.text: I see results with this belt. My posture has definitely improved. I can feel the muscles flexing when working out with this belt. However, I really do wish it came a little wider. I feel as though it gets the main stomach but some skin, in my case a little above the belt, is missed and doesn’t get worked on.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Need to use frequently.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that if I use it continuously it would work. But I have not yet. Used just a couple times since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: PannaraiPew

customer_reviews.title: It definitely gets a nice sweat going
customer_reviews.text: This product fits well and doesn't slip off or out of place. It would fit many different body types. I have worn it in the gym as well as at work (I'm a nurse). I can't tell I have it on and it doesn't bother me during my workout or shift. It definitely gets a nice sweat going! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: however I did get a pretty bad rash after a few hours of wearing it ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sweat a lot in it, however I did get a pretty bad rash after a few hours of wearing it at the gym. Still, it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love my rhino balance waist trimmer
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my rhino balance waist trimmer! I don’t only wear it during workouts or went I’m out walking but also while I’m doing household chores and at work. The material of this belt is soft and thin enough to hide even under work attire. The warmth and slight moisture tells me that I’ve had a workout even while doing dishes. Highly recommend this product for any level of fitness!
customer_reviews.author: nadya hussain

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: I really like this belt. I use it so that I sweat more and it's also a nice back support. I love using it on Leg day or any day I'm lifting heavy weights.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle R

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I bought this one due the other ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought this one due the other sweat band was getting old the zipper was coming undone. I love this product oh so much! The Velcro stayed secured during all my work outs so far. Only down side was having some type of black residue on my skin from the top of the band even after wiping it down prior to first use.
customer_reviews.author: AMS

customer_reviews.title: works as good as the more expensive ones
customer_reviews.text: so this is the 2nd band I got from amazon. the only reason I got this one was because the first one I ordered was too large so i returned it and decided to go with one that was a bit cheaper. it works just as well as the more expensive one. I swear like crazy and enjoy it when working out of just around the house. love it in the sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Clingman

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife since she really needs to loose weight. She wears it at home and when going out and said it's really comfortable to wear. It helps her sweting more and looks a bit thiner underneath her clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not too Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Expected better quality and it to not roll up so easily
customer_reviews.author: Hoosierdreamz

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Helps me to sweat much more than I thought. Makes me feel great and wanting to sweat. Great material. Dries quickly
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian OT

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best sweat belts that I’ve ever had...It stays secure even during hard tough workouts...After 2 weeks I can already see the difference in my stomach...Once this one gets old a worn out I will be purchasing another one....
customer_reviews.author: Tajuana🌹

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Worked up a sweat around my waist on our exercise bike and seeing results after three uses. It’s good quality and love that it came with an iPhone case. I would purchase again and recommend this
customer_reviews.author: Mom on a budget

customer_reviews.title: I love this belt
customer_reviews.text: I love this belt! It makes me sweat every where not just in the middle. It is so good during my workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Like a Charm
customer_reviews.text: I have the Sweet Sweat brand thigh trimmers and love them, and I just bought this... the materials are very much alike and it's comfortable and allows mobility. I've noticed a difference already! Love handles are quickly disappearing! I love this product- highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality product with a very usful phone holder.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most well made with high quality products on Amazon I bought. Very happy to buy this with two years warranty.
customer_reviews.author: "nsihock"

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, it actually fits people who aren't skinny :)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Prather

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big guy. 6'2 295. And it fits be perfect. I've used it for a month now. And it's held up so far. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Antione2k6

customer_reviews.title: and is look the same like in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Thank you, it was arrived in 2 days, and is look the same like in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: It makes you sweat for sure. I wear it ...
customer_reviews.text: It makes you sweat for sure. I wear it to gym and in the sauna. Just wish it was bigger to cover more of my waist/core.
customer_reviews.author: J Piper

customer_reviews.title: the belt came with extra accessories which i find very useful. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Can't compare to others as it is my first waist trimmer but within half hour of my workout I was feeling the extra burn. When you unwrap the belt you can see a difference almost immediately. The sweat is proof and extra icing on the cake so to speak. Also, the belt came with extra accessories which i find very useful. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the belt but when I wear it to workout ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the belt but when I wear it to workout I feel a bit self conscious because it makes me look lumpy
customer_reviews.author: courtney parker

customer_reviews.title: Works really well, when I first put it on ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, when I first put it on I was just doing some things around the house and I went to take it off and it was covered in sweat!
customer_reviews.author: Payton Billings

customer_reviews.title: Love it, I didn't think the cellphone arm case ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, I didn't think the cellphone arm case was going to fit my arm. But it made it work
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Antillon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my belt feels really good. Makes me keep my posture correct.
customer_reviews.author: brineidy alexander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this band fits! Total coverage and it gets as tight as necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not a good product, didn't make me sweat at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E. Kirshon

customer_reviews.title: Gives me a good sweat and the velcro lasts
customer_reviews.text: Really feel the support and the heat around my core. Gives me a good sweat and the velcro lasts. So far I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Griffith

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This wrap works so well!!!! I am not a sweater and if I do a 30 minute work out with this on when I take it off my whole stomach and back is dropping! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Doesn’t roll up like other ones have in ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Doesn’t roll up like other ones have in the past. Creates great sweat in the area that you wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Dbm

customer_reviews.title: It make me sweat a lot and I wear it ...
customer_reviews.text: It make me sweat a lot and I wear it all the day, it helps me to lost the cellulite in my belly ski and sometimes when I workout I wear them in my leg and After 2 weeks I can see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Savela

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit. One size fits all is a lie
customer_reviews.author: Kacie Hollenbach

customer_reviews.title: and nicely portable for use when travelling
customer_reviews.text: High quality materials, very effective at raising core temp during a workout, and nicely portable for use when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Love. Made very durable, stays in place, and does the job. The best one I have had this far.
customer_reviews.author: You know

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Scam product. Should have read some science articles first. Whoops!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: been using it for a week! I love it so far! Makes me sweat a ton, and isn’t too uncomfortable:)
customer_reviews.author: matthew dawson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the results I am getting with this!! With just 30 days of working out with this on, I see results I’m just very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Corina Orozco

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Works on a small waist. If your a size 10 it won’t fit
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Not wide enough to shape your middle while working out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Siobhan M.

customer_reviews.title: Good back support, no change to waist area
customer_reviews.text: I definitely work up a sweat while wearing this to the gym but I haven't noticed any difference in my waist yet. However it does provide pretty good back support and makes me want to sit up straighter. I will update if I see any changes to my waist and stomach area.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does everything it stated. I use this daily when I go to the gym!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph K

customer_reviews.title: holds up very good during the day and also work out
customer_reviews.text: Result takes long way but so far, it does its job well, holds up very good during the day and also work out, it does make the area sweat. And as a chef I have to stand whole day and it somehow helps me with my back pain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Premium Waist Trimmer Ultra Soft 3.5mm Neoprene Workout Sweat Belt. Sweet Ab Belt For Women with Sauna Effect - Waist Trainer Corset For Weight Loss Wrap - Flex Belt with 2 Free Bonus Gifts!
product_meta.description:
Are you struggling to lose weight after having a baby? Have a busy schedule with less time for the gym?
If so, you’re not alone. Millions of people are trying desperately to lose weight, tone their bodies but have no time in their busy schedule for lengthy workouts.

You may need a little something to maximize your time & calorie burn, without spending hours in the gym!
That’s why we developed the Rhino Balance Waist Trimmer Belt...

Now, you may be thinking, what’s the difference between the Rhino Balance Waist Trimmer & other belts on the market?

Our belt is made with the highest quality materials to naturally increase core temperature & sweat levels to maximize your calorie burn – with minimal time & effort!
Other belts are made with cheaper materials & lower grade neoprene causing repeat purchases. Our belt is premium quality at a fraction of the cost!

Here at Rhino Balance, we provide only high quality, easy to use products, so you can achieve those desired results! 
Our belt is as easy to put on as your favorite shirt!

Our Waist Trimmer Benefits: Thermogenic activity - Increases your core temperature & sweat levels to maximize calorie burn!
3.5 mm Latex-free high grade neoprene & double stitched trim - Gives you Rhino strength & durability
Unique inner velcro strip & advanced textured grid - Added belt security
Thin, lightweight, flexible & adjustable - Move naturally & comfortably during activity. Great for home, gym or work!
One size – Designed to fit women of a variety of body shapes & sizes
Support - Extra back & ab support

Everything you need for great results!
Go with the brand you can trust, will always “tell it like it is” & provides you with products that flat out work!

Pick Up Your Waist Trimmer Now & Experience the Sweat Generating Power of the Rhino Balance Waist Trimmer belt; grab a belt for a friend & share your weight loss journey together!
feature_bullets: 👶 LOOKING TO LOSE THAT BABY WEIGHT? - Do you have a hard time losing weight after having your baby? Your non-invasive waist trimmer belt acts as a BUILT IN SAUNA to increase your core temperature and sweat levels during physical activity; helping you burn more calories & get back to your pre-pregnancy body faster!

👶 LITTLE TIME TO WORKOUT? - This waist trainer corset for weight loss belt can be worn at the gym, at work or even during your morning jog with your baby. Tired? Skipping a workout? That’s OK! Use it around the house while working up a sweat! - start using right away!

👶 INCREASED AB & BACK SUPPORT – This workout belt helps with your core stabilization & will provide you with extra back support during activity. This ONE SIZE FITS ALL sweat belt is designed to fit waists up to 44" with a maximum elastic limit of 50"

👶 HIGHEST QUALITY DURABLE MATERIAL FOR SECURITY & COMFORT - Premium grade, lightweight & non-bulky design (stays hidden under your clothes); latex free, 3.5 mm neoprene waist trimmer belt with double stitched trim allows you to stay comfortable and keep using your workout ab belt over and over again!

👶 2 BONUS GIFTS - As a bonus, you get a sweet breathable travel mesh bag and cellphone armband. This is all you need to maximize your workouts and look good doing it! Why not share your journey to health with a friend or family member. Buy one for a friend and you will get 15% off your second sweat belt!
